content.question: The application of paint is most similar to that of

choices.label: Jacques-Louis David’s The Oath of the Horatii
Paul Gauguin’s Where Do We Come From? What Are We? Where Are We Going?
Johannes Vermeer’s Woman Holding a Balance

topic.text: 4.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
